news_header: Wicked Megacorp reported a revised EBita operating result of EUR 0.1 million for Q4, down from EUR 0.4 million the previous year, with a margin of 0.6%. Despite a drop in turnover, the company aims for improved profitability in 2024.
news_original_title: Witted Megacorpin loppuvuoden tulos laski, mutta koko vuonna saatiin kannattavuuskäänne – Osinkoa luvassa
news_text: Wicked Megacorp released its fourth quarter results showing a revised EBita operating result of EUR 0.1 million, a decrease from EUR 0.4 million in the same period last year. The margin fell to 0.6% from 2.7%. Earnings per share were EUR -0.01 compared to EUR 0.02 a year ago, with net sales at EUR 13.6 million, down from EUR 16.0 million. CEO Harri Siep noted that 2024 will be challenging, but the company successfully improved profitability despite market difficulties. The Board proposed a dividend of EUR 0.02 per share, not paid the previous year, and aims for a corrected EBita of over 8% in Finnish business by 2025.
